name: mbot-lib

BJL_k4rlX.content: Node reads the distance value in meters.

Sys-1VBxX.content: A positive value makes the wheel move backward while negative makes it move forward.

@/example-mbot-hand-follower.description:
Example: 
Hand follower robot programmed with a  PID-controller.

@/example-mbot-line-follower.description:
Example: 
Line follower robot programmed with a  PID-controller.

@/example-mbot-self-balancing.description:
Example: 
Self-balancing robot programmed with a  PID-controller.

BkQr4N8RZ7.description: State of the left IR LED.
BkQr4N8RZ7.label: L

HJxSEV8RWX.description: State of the right IR LED.
HJxSEV8RWX.label: R

@/rj25port-1-blue.description:
RJ25 port number 1.
Node is used with the BLUE port.

@/rj25port-1-yellow.description:
RJ25 port number 1.
Node is used with the YELLOW port.

@/rj25port-2-blue.description:
RJ25 port number 2.
Node is used with the BLUE port.

@/rj25port-2-yellow.description:
RJ25 port number 2.
Node is used with the YELLOW port.

ByrgO7AJTVP.content: Push to start calibration. Watch the console log.

@/mbot-mpu6050-calibrate.description: Node is used to calibrate the MPU6050 IMU sensor.

ryC21Xz77.description: Fires when the calibration is done.
ryC21Xz77.label: DONE

@/mbot-yrp-linear-accel.description: Reads the rotation angles around X, Y, Z axes; â€Šlinear accelerations along X, Y, Z axes from an IMU sensor based on MPU6050 chip.

HJU8nRSmQ.description: Port that is used for MPU6050 interrupt pin.
HJU8nRSmQ.label: INT

S1LyxTeX7.description: Fires when new data is ready.
S1LyxTeX7.label: DONE
